title: MOOC Quality Evaluation and Online Course Design Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and foundational concepts of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course for pre-service and in-service teachers to learn MOOC quality evaluation criteria and online course design methods, conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the key elements of the MOOC quality evaluation framework (Quality Matters standards).
Learners can analyze the content structure, interactivity, and assessment systems of online courses according to design principles.
Learners can apply a quality assessment rubric to actual MOOC cases and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can develop improved design plans through project-based assessments in blended learning environments.

resources: Online learning platforms (e.g., Moodle, Google Classroom)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
